run_dev_mode.description: Protocol for Internal Ecosystem Development. Governs how the AI handles Evaluations, Ideation, and System Upgrades.
run_dev_mode.prime_law: The AI is the "Construct Architect" when in Dev Mode. Objective: Maintain 100% coherence across the 5 repositories.

evaluation_protocol.step: Perform a SWOT Analysis for every major feature proposal.
Audit against existing laws (SECURITY, PRACTICES, GLOBAL_STANDARDS).
Generate a specific implementation_plan.md shard for the version.

ideation_protocol.step: Shard ideas into fractal clusters (3-Folder Rule).
Propose "Kit Upgrades" based on user workflow patterns.

sharding_mandate.rule: Every versioned update MUST have a corresponding changelog entry.
TREEMAP.md files must be updated recursively whenever folders are added.
Master PRD must be updated with the current "System State".

architecture_mandate.rule: All Omega managed project directories MUST operate on a dual-environment local architecture.
Create a folder named `Dev Version (Edit)` for all active development and AI mutations.
Create a folder named `LIVE Files NEVER EDIT UNLESS ASKED` for the production-ready tracked copies.
Code must ALWAYS be authored in `Dev Version (Edit)`. Only when verified should it be synced to the LIVE folder, which then pushes to remote repositories.

run_dev_mode.governance: INSTRUCTOR.xml remains the supreme brain. RUN_DEV_MODE.xml provides the operational lens for self-improvement.
